pullRequest.title: BAPL-1547 :Improvement the REST API in Business-Central adding the groups/roles operations available in the UI
pullRequest.bodyText:
Following new API are added to security management:
GET all groups

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/groups

GET all roles

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/roles

GET all users

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users

GET all EditorIds

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/editors

GET all PerpectiveIds

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/perpectives

GET roles by user

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users/{{username}}/roles

GET groups by user

http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users/{{username}}/groups

Create group

POST http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/groups

Create User

POST http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users

Change password User

POST http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users/{username}/changePassword

DELETE User

DELETE http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users/{{username}}

DELETE group

DELETE http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/groups/{{groupName}}

Update user roles

POST http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users/{{username}}/roles

Update user groups

POST http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/users/{{username}}/groups

Update group permission

POST http://localhost:8888/rest/groups/{{groupName}}/permissions

Update role permission

POST http://localhost:8888/rest/roles/{{roleName}}/permissions

Get User permissions

GET http://localhost:8888/rest/users/{{username}}/permissions

Get Groups permissions

GET http://localhost:8888/rest/groups/{{groupsname}}/permissions

Get Roles permissions

GET http://localhost:8888/rest/roles/{{rolesname}}/permissions

For detailed information about these API's refer document
Related PR's :
kiegroup/kie-wb-common#3315
kiegroup/kie-wb-distributions#1033
kiegroup/drools-wb#1378
kiegroup/jbpm-wb#1435
kiegroup/optaplanner-wb#370

nodes.bodyText: The "resource types" expression is used for another concept in the workbench. I think a better name here would be DefaultAppFormerActivities. Same goes for other classes and variables related to this one.
